5.Pros: Flexible, fast paced environment, great people

6.Pros: Most staff are pretty friendly. Depending on which location you're at, the pay can actually be decent. You'll also get one free meal every day, and the managers are generally very flexible when it comes to scheduling. There's also a fair bit of room for growth.
6.Cons: Managers go on power trips sometimes and hold you to ridiculous standards. Customers are super rude. Generally a very high stress environment.

7.Pros: easy money, the job is not too difficult itself and it has many opportunities in terms of job mobility. my coworkers are easy to work with as well
7.Cons: the hours are too long. 12 hour shifts for non managers. often keep you for overtime, not worth it in my opinion

8.Pros: Working at McDonalds you get to interact with all different kinds of people (except Vegans!). All nationalities. Eat salads to maintain your good physique. Be careful of the meat industry.
8.Cons: Once I became vegan I couldn't look at a hamburger without wanting to cry. I laid awake at night with terrors of the suffering inherent in the system that I was a part of. I couldn't come to work, and have since adopted cows to live in my backyard.

9.Cons: Rude customers, over time, late nights.
